SceneDescription.name: Kitchen
SceneDescription.description: The kitchen is fairly clean, though the chef is nowhere to be seen. No maids are present either.

condition.additionalDescription:
Though the air is warm and heavy, a delightful aroma wafts through the room from a rack of freshly baked bread.
Assassin: That smells really good...

action.description: Assassin: I’ll just take this for strategic...bread purposes...
